readable.title: 2717686269_80c4b5ac9e
readable.content: A brown and white dog relaxes on a carpet in sunlight . A brown dog resting on a red , white , and blue afghan rug . A German short-haired pointer rests on a rug by a sunny window . A small brown and white dog lines on a red area rug in a patch of sunlight . Window shades cast light and shadow on a dog lying on a colorful carpet .
